Decision trees are simple predictive models which map input attributes to a target value using simple conditional rules. Trees are commonly used in problems whose solutions must be readily understandable or explainable by humans, such as in computer-aided diagnostics and credit analysis. A much more [http://crsouza.blogspot.com.br/2012/01/decision-trees-in-c.html#!/2012/01/decision-trees-in-c.html detailed explanation on Decision Trees is also available].
